    A TRAVEL GUIDE FOR THE JOURNEY OF LIFE

    From concert promoter to international economic developer, and from Germany to Kyrgyzstan, American author and travel addict Judson L Moore seems to have done it all and to have done it everywhere. Get a sneak peek today at his new book: a guide to his learnings, adventures, and life hacks for how to discover and achieve your goals.

    You will be subscribed to email updates. Unsubscribe anytime.

    Under conditions which many would consider unbearable, Judson not only found a way to try something new, but he was the driving force behind making it flourish.

    Bettina Ruigies, DeutscheWelle Akademie

    I have a deep respect for Judson’s passion and commitment to free speech and social justice.

    ABOUT THE AUTHOR

    I didn't have many extraordinary advantages growing up, but what I did have was the encouragement of those older than me saying, "do it while you're young." One day, when I was 17, that advice stuck and I started traveling the world. I haven't stopped and now half a lifetime later, I want to tell the world what I've learned and how YOU can live an adventurous and prosperous life!

    TABLE OF CONTENTS
